pageContext.claim: “The biggest difference between now and 2016 is @FoxNews. They are a whole different deal. Despite this, our campaign is doing much better, with bigger crowds and even more (much!) enthusiasm, than we had in 2016. Big Debate & SCOTUS Win! Real Polls have us winning everywhere!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump consistently trailed Biden in the polls throughout the duration of the election, according to the polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight.
